ygData.subject: I'm at skill 160 and wasting Plat like crazy
ygData.msgSnippet: Before the patch my skill was 159. At this skill lvl I was using a (field, wooden, ceramic, large) bundle/combination to raise my skill.  After the patch I
ygData.messageBody:
Before the patch my skill was 159. At this skill lvl I was using a (field,
wooden, ceramic, large) bundle/combination to raise my skill. After the
patch I decided to try to raise my skill some more. I wasted close to 40
plat after selling the made arrows back to the NPC to raise my lvl to 160. I
had to buy 30 bundles (costing about 3.5 plat a bundle) to raise my skill
one point. Therefore, I am wondering, since everything now costs 5 times as
much, do we get 5 times the chance to raise our skill with each try? I
don't believe so, since that would have given me 150 tries to raise my lvl 1
point. Am I right? or am I doing something wrong?
